content: The author conducted an experiment using OpenClaw on a Mac Mini with extensive access to personal and work data (WhatsApp, Telegram, diaries, filesystem, Slack/Discord, X timeline, photos, Oura ring, Eight Sleep data) to test AI's productivity-boosting capabilities.

When setting up an AI with extensive data access, implement safety guardrails such as restricting prompting to a single user, sanitizing inputs, and incorporating emergency measures and human-gated permissions.

AI currently struggles to assist with high-level organizational tasks such as gathering context, making decisions, setting product vision/strategy, coordinating teams, providing morale, and reporting to stakeholders, due to its inability to grasp sufficient context.
AI is currently ineffective at discerning important information from emails or summarizing inbox content without omissions, leading to a poor understanding of complex situations.
